httpy¶

A Python lightweight socket-based library to create HTTP(s) connections.

Features¶

  • Cookies support

  • Caching support

  • Easy debugging

  • HTTP authentication

  • Form support

Requirements¶

  • Python>=3.6

Usage¶

It’s easy.

1import httpy
2resp = httpy.request("https://example.com/") # Do a request
3resp.content #Access content

httpy
